name: Hardest 11.15 "Loathe and Marriage" Trivia Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 11 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was pregnant in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Serafina.

	Serafina was Carla's second oldest child. Because she was pregnant she wanted to marry the baby's father.

questions.text: What did Carla say was the worst reason to marry?
questions.explanation:
love.

	She said that her biggest mistake was marrying Nick because she loved him. She also said that he got her sister pregnant as well.

questions.text: Who gave Woody and Kelly a set of "Star Trek" steak knives for their wedding?
questions.explanation:
Frasier and Lilith.

	Frasier sounded offended at first. Then, we found out that the Cranes got it from Norm and Vera on their wedding day.

questions.text: Who was making a romantic pass at Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
Gino.

	Gino was Carla's third oldest child. Rebecca told him he was too young for her.

questions.text: Who showed up to the wedding and made Carla upset?
questions.explanation:
Nick.

	She was upset because Nick's never there for his children. For once, he showed up when it mattered. Serafina wanted him at the wedding however.

questions.text: What did Nick and Loretta get Serafina and the man she was marrying?
questions.correct: A set of "Star Trek" steak knives
questions.explanation:
A set of "Star Trek" steak knives.

	Nick said they drove 22 hours to get to Boston for the wedding. He also said, "I have a right to be here, I'm going to stay."

questions.text: What did Nick say he had the opportunity to purchase?
questions.explanation:
An orangutan act.

	Nick always had crazy schemes to make money. Fraiser asked Cliff, "Did he say purchase or join?"

Pat.

	Pat was played by Dennis Cockrum. In 1984, he earned an MA in Drama from Eastern Michigan University.

questions.text: What did Carla say was all that mattered to her?
questions.explanation:
Her children.

	It was rare to see Carla be so vulnerable. She often talked about her children. She usually acted like she didn't care about them, but here we saw that she did.

questions.text: When Carla told Nick, "You do anything to spoil my daughter's wedding day, I'll choke you until your eyes bug out," what did Cliff say?
questions.explanation:
It's just like the Waltons.

	Carla's family was probably the complete opposite of the Waltons. Nick got to stay for the wedding due to Serafina's wish to be given away by her father.
